TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed X509KeyUsageFlags extends System.Enum

remarks.para: The X.509 Key Usage Flags can be used to determine what operations a certificate can be used for.
Note: a value of indicates that there are no restrictions on the use of the .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.X509KeyUsageFlags CrlSign = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The key may be used for verifying signatures on certificate revocation lists (CRLs).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.X509KeyUsageFlags DataEncipherment = int32(16)

Docs.summary: The key may be used for data encipherment.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.X509KeyUsageFlags DecipherOnly = int32(32768)

Docs.summary: The key may only be used for deciphering data during key agreement.
Docs.remarks: When both the bit and the bit are both set, the key may be used only for deciphering data while performing key agreement.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.X509KeyUsageFlags DigitalSignature = int32(128)

Docs.summary: The key may be used for digitally signing data.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.X509KeyUsageFlags EncipherOnly = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The key may only be used for enciphering data during key agreement.
Docs.remarks: When both the bit and the bit are both set, the key may be used only for enciphering data while performing key agreement.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.X509KeyUsageFlags KeyAgreement = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The key is meant to be used for key agreement.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.X509KeyUsageFlags KeyCertSign = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The key may be used for verifying signatures on certificates.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.X509KeyUsageFlags KeyEncipherment = int32(32)

Docs.summary: The key is meant to be used for key encipherment.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.X509KeyUsageFlags None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: No limitations for the key usage are set.
Docs.remarks: The key may be used for anything.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.X509KeyUsageFlags NonRepudiation = int32(64)

Docs.summary: The key may be used to verify digital signatures used to provide a non-repudiation service.
